name: Ask Her Out
description:
Mint met a girl at a concert. She was very cute. So now she's going to go ask her out.

Take a walk to your crush's house, talking to a bunch of pals along the way. 99% inside-references, but hey, maybe you'll find it cute anyways.

My first ever game.

Controls: Arrow Keys, Z to interact

Sources:

Pixel Pete's Art Assets: https://petermilko.itch.io/pixel-petes-art-assets

Gameboy Tileset: https://sondanielson.itch.io/gameboy-simple-rpg-tileset

GB Studio: https://www.gbstudio.dev/
